..pull-request-header:
## :warning: Manual changes required

 * `.pre-commit-config.yaml`: The Release will be prefixed by `v` (as in `v1.2.3`) but release-please does not edit the file with the `v` prefix.
 * `src/creosote/__about__.py`: The file must be manually bumped, until hopefully https://github.com/googleapis/release-please/issues/2433 has been considered.
 * Manual review of the `publish` workflow must be approved to publish to pypi.
